transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to cancel an appointment.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopedics, part of Pretty Good AI. I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi Alex, this is James Williams. I'd like to cancel my appointment for next Monday morning.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, James. Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. Your full name is James Williams, and your date of birth is November third nineteen sixty six?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Is that correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: James Williams, with a date of birth on November 3, 1966.
